text: Our Generation has has has probably
seen the biggest acceleration of change
that that has happened in in the world
ever in the history of mankind
because in in our life the mobile phone
was invented the internet was invented
computers started to be there and and
just access to information
um has has been provided I mean nowadays
everyone can access any type of
information almost instantly on their
mobile phone um wherever they are and
and I remember sort of the first mobile
phone you had these things in the car
and then you had to go to the boot and
take out the battery and the receiving
was this big and you could carry it like
a briefcase and now you've got these
tiny little iPhone things which are
fantastic um and with that you can reach
anyone in the world you can find out
about anything that you're interested in
and and I think that's probably the most
exciting development is just this
democratization of of information and
its availability which then again fuels
stories because people can get the
inspiration that previously they may
have been denied access to and they can
formulate messages and send them
